mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hallway, Mount Vernon Mansion
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of the central passage in the Mansion at Mount Vernon. View towards staircase and west entrance with door open to Mansion circle with sundial. Pillars added for support. Note the variety of barriers in the doorways made of both wood and metal grating. The following text is printed directly onto the reverse of the cardboard mount: Hallway, Mount Vernon Mansion. Copyrighted by Luke C. Dillon, Photographer to Mount Vernon, Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 Penn. Avenue, Washington, D.C.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Central passage
